Es Un gran juego Con Una gran mecanica
Una Jugablidad pasable y puedes pasartela Bien ya eligas Jugando De Asesino O Superviviente.
Aun que Aveces Puedes Enfadarte ya que el juego no es equitativo y Siempre Deciden Nerfear Perks o killer inecesariamente y darle Una Mayor ventaja con hablidades o acessorios op.
 Y los superviviente tiene una gran desventaja pero bueno es digerible

Pero lo que mas Molesta de este juego es cuando agregan un nuevo dlc o sale una nueva actualizacion siempre hay algun que otro bug.
Pero apesar de todo eso Sigue siendo un gran juego que puedes pasarte horas y horas viciandolo 
Ya sea con amigos o solo.
Totalmente recomendable lo valeğŸ‘ğŸ¼
Even if this game is a bit broken, it's a lot funny to play with your friend, or play killer in online match.

This game can be fun on your own and with friends, the mechanics can be very buggy but overall the mechanics in this game are solid. However this game can be extremely toxic and frustrating at time. I do recommend playing this game but be prepared to want to die 90% of the time :)
VERY good it is very creative try it out
Sometimes the killers camp on the hooks so that sucks.
This game is so bad and trash it's kinda not trash. But it's definitely trash. Most of the time. So it's like most games.
Horrendous wait times for matchmaking but a fuckton of fun.

While challenging and sometimes infuriating, I would definitely recommend this game. Although if you're short fused and unwilling to put in the time to become good, forget about it. I love it and play it often.

This game has easily become one of the most fun games I've played in the last few months. I love aspects of both survivor and killer, I recommend playing both to truly get the full experience. 10/10 game, I found once you get passed the learning curve the joy in this game really sets in.

Very fun game concept, with infinite replayability due to the sheer variety of games you could encounter, as killer or survivor. 

The execution of the game is questionable at best, plagued with bugs and horrible design decisions. And yet it keeps it's playerbase, because of what does work and what could work.

It might have a lot of flaws & problems, however it is extremely fun & varied. It can cause a lot of anger to some people, but it is a game you either stop playing immediately or dedicate hundreds; even thousands of hours to.
Its one of the best games I have ever played. No doubt.
this game is simply fun with friends
writing this review now because i'm at 69 hours but it's genuinely the most multiplayer fun i've had in years. not having any voice chat or any in game communication definitely helps that a lot lol.

It for sure has it's flaws, unfortunate balancing, cheesy tactics, and a plethora of "WHAT THE HELL?" Moments, but every game does. All in all this is a wonderful translation of the slasher movie genre to game form, with so many intuitive and interesting game mechanics. Not only that but the licensed characters add so much to the game with their clever references through perks, add-ons, and cosmetics, yet the originally created survivors and killers all have a unique charm and interesting writing. The rank and matchmaking system defintely needs work, but it's easy to look past that. With the recent animation overhauls and graphic updates rolling out, now is the time to catch a ride, especially with Christmas coming up! This game has so much love poured into it, and has improved heavily since it's release. I have 89 hours as of writing this review and I'm happy to put 89 more.

plz for the love of god dont buy this shit game it sucks it is the worst game you can spend money on on steam let it die the devs dont care about players and they dont even understand their own game how can they balance it if they dont even understand what some of the perks they designed are for if you have already bought the game and you are lurking here fuck you.

This game is fun. You can hunt or survive. It's cool that there's multiple maps, killers, outfits, and survivors. You can even level up your character with game coins/blood points. Overall this game is great.
Muito divertido e desafiador. Com certeza um dos melhores jogos de terror que eu jÃ¡ joguei. ParabÃ©ns!

[b] Info about me [/b]

Been playing this game since 2/23/2018 with a total of 1,470 between console and pc. 

[b] What's wrong with the game [/b]
[list]
[*]Hit boxes
[*]Pallets
[*]Hooks
[*]Other Survivors
[*]Tunneling 
[*]Camping

[b] What I think [/b]

This game is a joke. If I'm being honest this game wasn't even that good back in 2018. I only play this game because this is one of the only game my friend and me can playing together since he's still on console. With update 6.1.0 this game is horrible to play as survivor. The pallet placements are a joke. 95% of the pallets on this game the killer can literally walk around them quicker than it takes for you to throw them down. You get hit through the pallet even if you manage to throw it down half the time and vaulting windows is no better. Breakable door make is so the loop that wasn't very good to begin with is even worse. 50% of the times your first hook will be your last. Killers tunnel you for the littlest thing. But don't you worry because the DEVS came up with a brilliant idea to counter that. You know get 5 seconds of endurance and 7% haste status effect whenever you get unhook and if your teammate runs borrow time you get an additional 10 seconds. If the killer is willing to wait Decisive Strike which is a perk that allows you to stab the killer if they pick you up within 60 seconds of getting unhook, they'll definitely wait out 15 seconds of endurance for you. Solo surviving is pretty much a death trap. No one ever does a gen and they die very quickly. They did buff a few perks for survivors that allow you to have the endurance status effect but you literally can't do anything while you have it or else it deactivates. So your team will now follow the killer around to take an extra hit for no reason or they spend half their time blessing boon totems. Generators take longer to do and with all these generator regressing builds it makes doing them a nightmare. Hooks are way too close to each other. They should just take the wiggle ability outta the game. Almost impossible to break free. Exit gates placements are always killer sided. 80% of the time the killer can stand in one place and watch both door or do a brisk walk to see the other. Your pretty much as good as dead if your the last survivor during the endgame collapse unless you some how get extremely lucky with the door placements.  I honestly can't remember the last time I had fun playing this game and after 1 round I'm ready to quit regardless if I survivor or die. You have to play so dirty to win that it makes the game not fun on both sides. This is from someone who plays mainly survivor.

If you do get this game I highly suggest you play with a 4 man survive with friends. It's about the only way to have fun.
Very fun. if solo play killer ,with friends play as a survivor. quick matches
Highly recommend, constant updates bring in endless amounts of fun]

si estas indeciso entre comprarlo o no, ten en cuenta las siguientes cosas: este juego esta pensado en jugadores mÃ¡s constantes que casuales, la cooperacion es vital para ganar, el asesino tiene mucha ventaja si no entiendes bien el juego, asÃ­ que no esperes salir vivo siempre y con amigos es MUCHO mejor. 
Este juego lo recomiendo por que lo he disfrutado, es divertido jugarlo como sobreviviente ya que es muy desafiante y produce una sensacion muy intensa de nervios. Como asesino es una experiencia muy distinta ya que es mÃ¡s relajada y te ayuda a sacar muchos puntos, aun asi. pasa que hay colas de 10 minutos donde la partida dura 3-4. espero que te sirva este mensaje en tu desicion c:
game has a lot about it and is very fun. i love being a killer and finding new ways to trick players to down them
